snippet.title: (GAMEPLAY TRAILER) Mobs 'N Monsters -Releasing on Steam in 2025
snippet.description:
Manage a spooky castle of monsters & fend off angry mobs with Slingshot action in this Physics-based Tower-Defense RTS. Fling vampires, mummies, werewolves, & more to make the local villages crumble. Upgrade your units & castle between battles for impenetrable defenses & cause monstrous destruction! 

Wishlist Today on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3277990/Mobs_N_Monsters/

Releasing 2025!
